original_story: "In the heart of the storm-tossed sea, brave Captain Jack uncovered a cryptic compass, pointing to the legendary island of El Dorado, veiled by the Bermuda Triangle. Battling merciless waves and mystical sea creatures, Jack and his crew faced perilous trials. Finally, under the radiant moonlight, El Dorado emerged, its golden city shimmering in the distance."

relation_mapping.\"In the heart of the storm: tossed sea, brave Captain Jack uncovered a cryptic compass, pointing to the legendary island of El Dorado, veiled by the Bermuda Triangle.
